Writing to the collection failed. The database could be corrupt or there may not to be enough empty space on disk.

If this happens more often, try checking the database, repairing the collection or restoring it from a backup. Touch â€œoptionsâ€ for that.
\Or it could be an AnkiDroid bug as well; please report the error so that we can check this.

string.name: set_due_date_match_interval
string.comment: when setting a card\'s due date, this checkbox also changes the interval of the card

plurals.comment: a date control is provided afterwards

plurals.name: set_due_date_range_label
plurals.comment: a date control is provided afterwards

plurals.name: set_due_date_label_suffix
plurals.comment: a suffix on a text field allowing a user to enter a number of days

string.name: range_delimiter
string.comment: Placed between two input boxes to denote a range

string.name: set_due_date_range_start
string.comment: \'Set Due Date\' may change the due date of a card to a random number of days in the future. This labels the \'minimum\' value of this range (inclusive)

string.name: set_due_date_range_end
string.comment: \'Set Due Date\' may change the due date of a card to a random number of days in the future. This labels the \'maximum\' value of this range (inclusive)
